name: Fast McLaren racing games 2017: cars race bus game
name_original: Fast McLaren racing games 2017: cars race bus game
description:
Fast McLaren racing games 2017 is a free cars race game that will entertain you every time you play it.

It is a free cars racing game app and will get quickly synchronized on your device take a look at the game features :

• You have to choose your car and begin the racing game
• Avoid all the other cars on the traffic, choose the multiple road map in the night to get more score and money
• Buy and unlock new speedy cars and gadgets to boost your speed
• Try the bus driving map, it's very cool
• Try to change the game setting for the car controls, camera and display setting, to choose the best you like.


Download this speed racing game and start enjoying unlimited with kids and friends! You will never get bored!

Have fun
